title: Added
text: Added (New functionality, arg options, more UI elements)

title: Changed
text: Changed (Visual changes, internal changes, API changes)

title: Removed
text: Removed (Dead code, feature flags, consumer API's)

title: Types
text: Types (Strictly related to the type system and should not have impact on runtime code)

title: Infra
text: Infra (Tooling, performance, things that are under the hood but should have no impact if a consumer upgraded)
